name: Drop Dumplings
author: Dottie Essner

ingredients.name: tsp. Witt's King O'York Gourmet Salt

instructions: Cut shortening into flour, baking powder and salt, until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Stir in milk. Drop dough by spoonfuls onto hot meat or vegetables in boiling stew. (Do not drop directly into liquid.) Cook uncovered 10 minutes. Cover and cook about 10 minutes longer. Makes 8 to 10 dumplings.Cheese Dumplings: Add 1/4 cup shredded sharp cheese (about 1 ounce) to dry ingredients.   Herb Dumplings: Add 1?2 teaspoon herbs (such as sage leaves, celery seed, or dried thyme) to the dry ingredients. Chive/Parsley Dumplings: Add 3 pounds snipped parsley or chives to the dry ingredients.
